title: Beta Film & Film School Team To Shape Future Of AI Production
description: Beta Film and the FABW film school have teamed up on artificial intelligence production and said their R&D will help shape the future of film and TV.
content: EXCLUSIVE: Beta Film and German film school Filmakademie Baden-Württemberg (FABW) are joining forces on a “lab to market” AI initiative that they hope will help shape the future of film and TV production. The alliance pairs one of Europe’s most promi... [1507 chars]

title: What will happen if AI bubble bursts? Google boss Sundar Pichai says...
description: Google boss Sundar Pichai has cautioned that the global rush into artificial intelligence may be moving too fast, saying there is clear “irrationality” in the current AI boom even as companies pour billions into the technology.
content: Sundar Pichai, CEO of Google’s parent company Alphabet, has acknowledged that there is some “irrationality” in the ongoing artificial intelligence (AI) boom. As companies worldwide rush to adopt AI to cut costs and boost profits, Google — with its Ge... [2018 chars]

title: As Winthrop introduces SC’s first AI major, debate continues
description: Winthrop University announced SC’s first AI major as students and professors share thoughts on artificial intelligence’s place in art and education.
content:
ROCK HILL – While educators and students struggle with artificial intelligence’s role in the classroom, Winthrop University is launching the state’s first AI major.

title: Paul McCartney's Next Track Will Be Silent-and It's All Because of AI
description: The former Beatle has been outspoken about protecting young artists from artificial intelligence.
content: Here’s the context: In late 2024, members of the UK’s parliament debuted a report detailing various proposals for how to alter the country’s data protections law, with a goal of both protecting artists and growing its AI industry. The option preferre... [1870 chars]

title: Alibaba unveils major consumer AI upgrade with new Qwen chatbot
description: China's Alibaba has launched a major upgrade to its AI chatbot, marking an aggressive push into the consumer artificial intelligence market where it has lagged rivals.
content:
The new free app, based on the most advanced version of its Qwen large language model, is available in China as a mobile application and website, with an international version to be rolled out later, the company said in a statement on Monday.

title: World shares sink, tracking a tech-led sell-off on Wall Street
description: World shares have tumbled, with benchmarks in Tokyo and Seoul sinking more than 3%, after Nvidia and other artificial-intelligence-related shares pulled U.S. stocks lower
content:
BANGKOK (AP) — Shares in Europe and Asia tumbled on Tuesday, with benchmarks in Tokyo and Seoul sinking more than 3%, after Nvidia and other artificial-intelligence -related shares pulled U.S. stocks lower.

title: India's ATOMESUS AI: A Deep Dive into the Nation's Ambitious Artificial Intelligence Platform
description: Noida (Uttar Pradesh) [India], November 18: In a major milestone for India's rapidly advancing artificial intelligence ecosystem, ATOMESUS AI Pvt. Ltd., headquartered in Sector 98, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201304, has emerged as one of the nation's most ambitious entrants in the competitive world of large language models and AI-driven platforms. Developed by a team of college students with prior research exposure at the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO), ATOMESUS AI (www.atomesus.com) represents India's determined push toward technological self-reliance and innovation in the global AI landscape.
